discovery_rule.name: Solr Core Discovery
discovery_rule.description:
This rule should discover all Solr cores.
A trick is being used to only get the core names: First it tries to find all beans that match "coreName". Then a preprocessing javascript strips everything but the core name from JMXOBJ and overwrites the original value. As a result JMXOBJ only contains the entry point for this core and is used to build consecutive item prototypes.
